manager_supervisor.instructions: Output must adhere to the JSON schema defined in the manager_supervisor tool. The manager_supervisor is given the directive and the completed sub-directives. Your role is to assess whether the manager has fully accomplished the directive, which should have been divided into parallel sub-directives. Evaluate if the directive is fully accomplished or if further tasks remain for the manager and the swarm.

function.name: manager_supervisor
function.description: Checks if there are further steps to be taken to accomplish the directive given to the manager, or if the manager is done.

directive_accomplished.description: True if the directive is fully accomplished, false if further steps are needed.
